mapper.select: SELECT file_name, file_location, file_regdate FROM tb_file JOIN tb_product ON tb_product.prdt_id = tb_file.prdt_id where tb_product.prdt_id = #{prdt_id} ORDER BY tb_file.file_regdate DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_location, file_size, file_del, file_del FROM tb_file WHERE prdt_id = #{prdt_id} ORDER BY file_regdate DESC LIMIT 1
